abstract: Top Oregon Democrats call on Gov John Kitzhaber to resign, citing his inability to lead amid ethics scandal involving his fiancee, Cylvia Hayes.
lead_paragraph: The state’s top Democrats urged Gov. John Kitzhaber to resign Thursday, saying he cannot lead effectively amid an ethics scandal involving his fiancée, a green-energy consultant suspected of using their relationship to land contracts for her business.

headline.main: Oregon’s Governor Is Asked to Step Down
headline.print_headline: Oregon’s Governor Is Asked to Step Down
